DOC.brief_summary: This 2 arm study assess safety efficacy tocilizumab monotherapy versus methotrexate patient active rheumatoid arthritis ( RA ) . Patients randomize receive tocilizumab 8mg/kg iv every 4 week plus placebo po weekly , methotrexate 7.5-20mg po weekly plus placebo iv every 4 week . The anticipated time study treatment 3-12 month target sample size 500+ individual .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Assess Safety Efficacy Tocilizumab Patients With Active Rheumatoid Arthritis
